content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information about outdated versions of forms, including
accepting outdated versions of a VA form
determining the date a form becomes outdated
example of outdated form determination
rejecting an outdated version of a VA form
, and
handling discontinued forms
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Recording the Date of Receipt and Handling Signatures and Outdated Forms
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
